programme.title: Space Channel's Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Welcome to Space Channel Universe! Bringing you the highlights of latest news, entertainment, launch coverage and so much more! Sit back and enjoy Space Channel Universe. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Day The Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warninf for all mankind. The people of Earth must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Force of Impact
programme.desc: The sky is literally falling in this thriller. As one of the nation's leading astronomers, Madison Kelsey believes she is tracking a huge rogue asteroid rocketing toward earth. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Kronos
programme.desc: Aliens from another world send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth. It absorbs all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Best of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel selects the our favorite Cinespace movies Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Presents Cinespace for all Humanity
programme.desc: Space Channel Presents Cinespace, an partnership between The Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA. These are award winning movies that will definitely inspire. Duration: 3600

programme.desc: When a math prodigy discovers a new way of predicting solar flares, he tries to warn of an impending catastrophe. But no one in power will heed his warnings. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: Giant robots from Venus invade Chicago. Stranded in the deserted city are strangers Frank and Nora. Duration: 7200
